title: Kirk Minihane Isn't Afraid of Bob Murchison
description:
Some people delight in causing misery for others. Bob Murchison is one of those people. For nearly three years, Bob has stalked Kirk Minihane and tried to ruin his life. On today's show, Minihane talks about the one year anniversary of his institutionalization, his struggle against lunatic activists, and the "state of the union" now that he's at Barstool Sports.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
